text: Paging @AnglianWater your lack of any sense of urgency in responding to sewerage flooding in March End, Buckingham is not good enough. I am grateful for @gregsmith_uk in chasing this up this afternoon. Water levels now manageable only due to residents' hard work @EnvAgencyAnglia https://t.co/b2h6qUrLtW

@EnvAgencyMids Meanwhile developer, Bellway, has dug channel though earth bund so that floodwater and silt off their site gets washed into ditch protecting existing housing. Normally a natural lake forms on the site during heavy rain. Stripped bare it will have more runoff.  Not as approved! https://t.co/kPgoICLrlv
